scripts.setup-env: node -e "const host = process.env.WEB_HOST; if (host) { require('fs').writeFileSync('.env', 'VITE_BACKEND_API=http://5000-' + host + '\n'); console.log('Updated .env with WEB_HOST:', host); } else { console.log('WEB_HOST not set, skipping .env update'); }"
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=server && npm run build --workspace=client
